cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB ID to an invalid hex format '0xZZZ' will cause parsing errors and gNB initialization failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting the restricted set config to 10 exceeds the valid range (0-2), leading to improper PRACH configuration and RACH failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將受限集合配置設定為 10 超過有效範圍 (0-2)，導致 PRACH 配置不當，並造成 RACH 失敗。
